channel.title: Fast Sync with Baobab on Klaytn CCO Onboarding - Baobab
channel.description: Recent content in Fast Sync with Baobab on Klaytn CCO Onboarding - Baobab

item.title: Download the latest Baobab chaindata
item.description: 1. Download the latest chaindata snapshot from the Baobab snapshot archive. 0) Before proceeding, please check if your disk space is enough to store and extract the Baobab chaindata. ** You can refer to the Boabab snapshot archive where the Baobab chaindata snapshots have been snapshotted. 1) Download the latest one from the archive. ** Please note that this step will take a long time to download since snapshot is more than 100 GB.

item.title: Extract the chaindata
item.description: 1. Extract the chaindata downloaded to the DATA_DIR. 1) For CN, $ grep "DARA_DIR" /etc/kcnd/conf/kcnd.out $ tar -C <your_klaytn_home_path>/kcnd/data -xvf klaytn-baobab-chaindata-latest.tar.gz ** If you don’t remember the path DATA_DIR, you can check kcnd.conf. 2) For PN, $ grep "DARA_DIR" /etc/kpnd/conf/kpnd.out $ tar -C <your_klaytn_home_path>/kpnd/data -xvf klaytn-baobab-chaindata-latest.tar.gz ** If you don’t remember the path DATA_DIR, you can check kpnd.conf. 2. You can remove the chaindata downloaded, if the previous step is completed.
